definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to think of/to call to mind/to anticipate
thought/thinking/idea/ideology/CL:個|个[ge4]
an ideal/a dream/ideal/perfect
unexpectedly
(fig.) to dream of/dream
way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to associate (cognitively)/to make an associative connection/mental association/word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs
abbr. for 聯想集團|联想集团[Lian2 xiang3 Ji2 tuan2]
to associate (cognitively)/to make an associative connection/mental association/word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs
abbr. for 聯想集團|联想集团[Lian2 xiang3 Ji2 tuan2]
to imagine/to fancy/CL:個|个[ge4]
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to imagine/to assume/to envisage/tentative plan/to have consideration for
delusion/fantasy
unexpected/hard to imagine/it had not occurred to me/who could have thought that
to recall/to recollect/to think back

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依旧想在iPad内容聚合器上看到更多的创新。

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23号，但是我对号码不确定。

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 无论你想去哪儿，都会有些友好的人。

sentences.english: All the female cats wanted to be the cat"s wife."
sentences.chinese: 所有母猫都想做他的夫人。

sentences.english: She may be not much, just want to let you stay with her.
sentences.chinese: 她也许要的不多，只是想让你陪陪她。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 过去的那个休赛期，有很多关于科比想被交易的报道。

sentences.english: But sometimes, ISP's and mail service businesses have no interest in righting what went wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有时，互联网的业务和邮件服务没有兴趣纠正想歪。

sentences.english: His mind reached after an understanding of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 他开动脑筋，想弄懂这个问题。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是觉得如果迈克尔能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: I think you are too busy to take an afternoon off.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们真是忙得连个下午都抽不出来了。

sentences.english: I think my brother has finally kicked the gambling habit.
sentences.chinese: 我想我哥哥算是绝对改掉牌赌的恶习啦。

sentences.english: He tried to tick me off, once; and I lost my temper.
sentences.chinese: 有一次他想叱责我，我发了脾气。

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: I can't wait to take a bite of the pumpernickel.
sentences.chinese: 我简直迫不及待想吃一口黑包。

sentences.english: Do you want a better job?
sentences.chinese: 你想找份更好的差使吗？

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地了解伊犁啊？

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
but/however/(used for emphasis) indeed

to wish/to want/ready/willing (to do sth)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
